summary: Improves Dragonplate Armour to make it better than Daedric, so that using a complete Dragonplate armour & Dragonbone weapon set would be viable
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red][size=3]Name          : [/size][/color]Improved Dragonplate Armour
[color=Red][size=3]Version       : [/size][/color]1.0
[color=Red][size=3]Date          : [/size][/color]13/08/12
[color=Red][size=3]Category      : [/size][/color]Armor
[color=Red][size=3]Author(s)     : [/size][/color]SoulLimit
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
DLC: Dawnguard is required for this mod to work
[color=Red]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=Red][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------[/color]
When dawnguard came out I was glad to see Dragonbone weapons. 
My only problem was that while Dragonbone weapons are the best in the game, DragonPlate armour was still worse than Daedric, which for me felt wrong. Why would weapons made out of the same stuff as the armour be the best, while the armour was not??

This mod increases the base armour value of Dragonplate armour to make it the best in the game.

[color=Red][size=4]Detail:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------[/color]
Armour Values, Vanilla and Modded:

Dragonplate boots - 
Vanilla - 17
Modded - 20

Dragonplate Gauntlets - 
Vanilla - 17
Modded - 20

Dragonplate Armour/Cuirass - 
Vanilla - 46
Modded - 50

Dragonplate Helmet - 
Vanilla - 22
Modded - 25

Dragonplate Shield - 
Vanilla - 34
Modded - 38


[color=Red][size=4]---Installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
Extract the esp file to your Skyrim/Data folder


[color=Red][size=4]---Uninstallation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]----------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
Delete the esp from your Skyrim/Data folder


[color=Red][size=4]Incompatabilities:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------------[/color]
This mod is likely to conflict with mods that also change the values of the dragonplate armour
